args:
The party visits a village where a fiend has
appeared demanding sacrifices. But this fiend
has a legendary Qilin relic called the Jin Gu Er.
The party is defeated once by the relic's
overwhelming power, but hearing Xuan Zang's
resolve sets them back on the fiend's trail.
Oh man, the sun's set already?\nGuess we're sleeping on rocks again.
While I'm quite accustomed to camping\noutdoors, doing it this many days in a row\nis proving to be rather arduous.

Well, if I ain't mistaken, there's a village
just ahead. If Lady Luck smiles on us,
we might be able to find a couple'a
rooms and a hot meal.
Then let's make one last push\nto that village!
Glad we made it here before the sun\ndropped for good.
...And there's a villager right now.\nHey! Buddy! You know where to get\na bed and some grub around here?!
Just a band of weary travelers\nlookin' for a soft pillow.
I mean no offense, travelers, but you'd\nbest be gone from this place at once.
But we just GOT here! C'mon, you gotta\nhave an inn or something. Heck, I'll even\ntake a barn if the straw is clean.
Today is not the day for such things.
Xuan Zang! I sense a Qilin relic\napproaching us at speed!
That fiend is in possession of the relic!
Oh no... I know that relic...
I WILL HAVE SACRIFICE\nI DEMAND SACRIFICE
IF I AM DENIED SACRIFICE\nI WILL LAY WASTE TO ALL
I'm...I'm the sacrifice! Take me and go!
The hell is going on here?!
If we do not offer a sacrifice,\nthe entire village is doomed!
Well, I ain't gonna let this stand.\nLooks like it's killin' time.
If there is one thing we are good at,\nit is eliminating troublesome fiends.
You people mean to FIGHT it?!
I'm getting a seriously weird feeling\nfrom this thing, master.
You are sensing the relic's power.\nHowever...
O power universal! Crown of heaven!\nPower of hundreds, skill of thousands!\nBy your gold I bind thee!
I couldn't...hold back the relic's power...
YOU DENY ME SACRIFICE\nNOW I DESTROY ALL
I told you, I will be your sacrifice!
COME TO ME\nCOME TO ME\nCOME TO ME
I'm so sorry. There was no other way.
What in the world is going on here?
For a while now, that fiend has been\nappearing and demanding a sacrifice.
If we refuse, it threatens to lay waste\nto our entire village. So we...we agree.
I ain't down with the idea of sacrificin'\npeople, but I also get that a buncha\nvillagers can't stand up to that thing.
Indeed, its power was astounding.\nWe must find a way to stop it.
It is the Jin Gu Er.
The fiend held a Qilin relic.\nThat relic is called the Jin Gu Er.
Even among Qilin relics, it possesses a\nstrength that is nothing short of legendary.
I'm sorry, everyone, but the time has\ncome for us to part ways.
I am a sealer. I cannot abandon my\nduty to find Qilin relics, no matter\nhow dangerous the task may be.
However, I cannot ask all of you\nto accompany me on this mission.
I can't let you do that, Xuan Zang;\nyou aren't the only one with a duty here.
It is my duty to protect this kingdom\nand all the people within it.
This village is under attackpeople are\nbeing dragged from their very homes.\nI will not stand by and see that happen.
Yeah, what kinda heroes would we be\nif we ran off after getting our butts\nhanded to us in a fight?
And yet, we will be hard-pressed to defeat\nthat fiend and its relic on our own.
Which is all a fancy way of sayin' we gotta\nwork together or die apartso let's get\nto workin' together, yeah?!
Let's go, everyone.\nWe have a fiend to catch.
